item.title: 中国驻印度大使：北京不会参与市场倾销
item.description: 中国驻印度大使许飞宏周二撰文称，中国不会因为与美国的贸易战和关税战而在其他国家倾销商品，他试图消除人们对中国廉价商品充斥其他市场的担忧。【原文：China will not dump its goods in other countries due to its trade and tariff war with the U.S., Beijing's ambassador to India, Xu Feihong, wrote in an article on Tuesday, trying to allay fears of cheap Chinese goods flooding other markets.】

item.title: 美国会计师事务所利用印度缓解人才紧缺问题
item.description: 包括 RSM US、Moss Adams、贝恩资本支持的 Sikich 和 Apax Partners 支持的 CohnReznick 在内的美国会计师事务所正在印度扩大业务，以解决国内会计师严重短缺的问题。【原文：U.S. accounting firms including RSM US, Moss Adams, Bain Capital-backed Sikich and Apax Partners-backed CohnReznick are expanding their operations in India to tackle an acute shortage of accountants at home.】

item.title: 德意志银行第一季度利润增长 39%，但受关税影响
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周二公布第一季度利润增长 39%，原因是其全球投资银行部门在动荡的市场中债券和货币交易收入大幅增长。【原文：Deutsche Bank on Tuesday posted a 39% rise in first-quarter profit after its global investment banking division generated a big increase in revenue in bond and currency trading during volatile markets.】

item.title: 受益于 ETF 增长和英国客户，Amundi 管理资产增长 6
item.description: 欧洲最大的基金管理公司 Amundi 周二公布的季度资金流入情况符合预期，因为在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选总统后投资从美国转向欧洲之际，越来越多的人继续将资金投入追踪市场的基金。【原文：Amundi , Europe's biggest fund manager, posted quarterly inflows in line with expectations on Tuesday, as more people continued to put money into funds that track the market during a time when investment shifted from the United States to Europe following Donald Trump's election as president.】

item.title: 印度市场迎来近两年来最长时间的外国购买热潮
item.description: 周一，外国投资者延续了自2023年7月以来最长的买盘热潮，美国贸易协议的希望、低廉的企业估值以及印度对全球紧张局势的相对抵御能力等因素都起到了推波助澜的作用，帮助市场摆脱了对印巴摩擦的担忧。【原文：Foreign investors extended their longest buying spree since July 2023 on Monday, fuelled by U.S. trade deal hopes, cheap corporate valuations, and India's relative resilience to global tensions, helping markets shrug off concerns over India-Pakistan frictions.】

item.title: 早间竞标特朗普 2.0 仅剩 1362 天
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 汇丰银行第一季度利润下降 25%；启动 30 亿美元回购计划
item.description: 汇丰银行周二公布，由于加拿大和阿根廷业务处置的一次性费用，第一季度利润下降了 25%，随后启动了 30 亿美元的股票回购计划。【原文：HSBC launched a $3 billion share buyback after reporting a 25% fall in first-quarter profit on Tuesday due to one time charges related to business disposals in Canada and Argentina.】

item.title: 中国称其航空公司和波音公司受到关税的严重影响
item.description: 中国商务部周二发表声明称，中国的航空公司和波音公司受到美国加征关税的严重影响，许多企业的正常贸易和投资活动受到干扰。【原文：Chinese airlines and Boeing have been severely impacted by U.S.-imposed tariffs, disrupting regular trade and investment activities of many businesses, the Chinese commerce ministry said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中美对峙导致股市下跌，美元下滑
item.description: 周二，股市横盘整理，美元则创下多年来最大单月跌幅，因为投资者担心贸易战会在财报和经济数据中有所体现。【原文：Stocks ticked sideways on Tuesday while the dollar headed towards its largest monthly fall for years as investors braced for the trade war to be felt in earnings and economic data.】

item.title: 美元因中美贸易僵局而步履维艰
item.description: 由于美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）暗示中国有责任启动谈判，投资者对中美贸易战是否正在降级并不十分明确，美元周二勉强收复重挫。【原文：The dollar barely recouped its heavy losses on Tuesday as investors were no clearer on whether a de-escalation of the Sino-U.S. trade war was underway with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent suggesting the onus was on China to start negotiations.】

item.title: 中国科技竞争加剧，阿里巴巴推出先进的 "问云 3 "人工智能系统
item.description: 中国科技巨头阿里巴巴集团周二推出了 "奇文三号"，这是其旗舰人工智能模型的升级版，引入了新的混合推理功能。【原文：Chinese tech giant Alibaba Group launched Qwen 3 on Tuesday, an upgraded version of its flagship artificial intelligence model that introduces new hybrid reasoning capabilities.】

item.title: 路透社调查：特朗普关税开始影响韩国出口 - 路透社
item.description: 路透社周二的一项民意调查显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收关税，包括对汽车和钢铁征收关税，韩国4月份的出口预计将下降。【原文：South Korea's exports are expected to have fallen in April, as U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, including those on autos and steel, started to weigh, a Reuters poll found on Tuesday.】

item.title: 经济前景黯淡，石油价格下跌
item.description: 原油价格在周二的亚洲早盘交易中下跌，原因是美国和中国这两个世界最大经济体之间持续不断的贸易战导致投资者降低了对需求增长的预期。【原文：Crude oil prices fell in early Asian trading on Tuesday as investors lowered their demand growth expectations due to the ongoing trade war between the United States and China, the world's two biggest economies.】

item.title: 美国航空公司起诉捷蓝航空，终止合作谈判
item.description: 美国航空公司（American Airlines）周一表示，由于与捷蓝航空（JetBlue）存在分歧，该公司已结束了与捷蓝航空的合作谈判，并已起诉捷蓝航空，以追讨东北联盟解散后拖欠该公司的款项。【原文：American Airlines said on Monday it has ended partnership talks with JetBlue over disagreements and has sued the carrier to recover money owed to it following the unwinding of the Northeast Alliance.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院撤销对 CFPB 大规模解雇的临时禁令
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周一恢复了消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）大规模解雇员工的临时禁令，允许员工暂时保留工作，尽管特朗普政府计划将该机构的员工人数缩减 90%。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Monday reinstated a temporary ban on mass firings at the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, allowing workers to keep their jobs for now despite the Trump administration's plan to shrink the agency's workforce by 90%.】

item.title: 巴西钢铁制造商 Gerdau 核心盈利小幅增长，美国收入增加
item.description: 钢铁制造商格尔道（Gerdau）周一公布的第一季度核心盈利略有增长，称美国对钢铁贸易政策的改变帮助抵消了其大本营巴西的疲软业绩。【原文：Steelmaker Gerdau on Monday posted a slight beat in its core earnings for the first quarter, saying the United States' changes in steel trade policy helped offset weaker results in its home base of Brazil.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，华尔街银行出售埃隆-马斯克 X 债务的最后一部分
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）、美国银行（Bank of America）、巴克莱银行（Barclays）和三菱日联银行（Mitsubishi UFJ）等多家银行出售了亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）以 440 亿美元收购社交媒体平台 Twitter（现名 X）的最后一笔债务。【原文：A group of banks including Morgan Stanley, Bank of America, Barclays and Mitsubishi UFJ sold the final piece of debt tied to billionaire Elon Musk's $44 billion buyout of social media platform Twitter, now called X, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 商务部长表示，特朗普将减少汽车关税的影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府官员表示，本周二将采取行动减轻汽车关税的影响，减轻对国产汽车中外国零部件征收的部分关税，并防止对国外生产的汽车征收的关税叠加其他关税。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration will move to reduce the impact of his automotive tariffs on Tuesday by alleviating some duties imposed on foreign parts in domestically manufactured cars and keeping tariffs on cars made abroad from piling on top of other ones, officials said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Fortescue 公司摆脱干扰，季度铁矿石发货量增加
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司 Fortescue 第三季度铁矿石出货量增加，超过了去年同期的表现，而去年同期的铁矿石出货量曾因火车出轨事故而受到影响。【原文：Australian miner Fortescue delivered increased third-quarter iron ore shipments, outperforming the year-ago period that had been hampered by a train derailment.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，索尼考虑分拆芯片部门
item.description: 据彭博新闻社援引匿名消息来源报道，索尼正在考虑最快于今年将其半导体业务分拆上市。【原文：Sony is considering a spinoff and listing of its semiconductor business as soon as this year, Bloomberg News reported, citing anonymous sources.】

item.title: 特朗普吹捧英伟达、J&J、现代、丰田在美投资
item.description: 官员们告诉路透社记者，来自英伟达（Nvidia）、强生（Johnson & Johnson）、丰田汽车（Toyota Motor）、礼来（Eli Lilly）和软银集团（SoftBank Group）的首席执行官和其他高管将于周三访问白宫，这是一项强调美国投资的活动的一部分。【原文：CEOs and other executives from Nvidia , Johnson & Johnson , Toyota Motor , Eli Lilly and SoftBank Group are among the more than two-dozen senior business leaders slated to visit the White House on Wednesday as part of an event highlighting U.S. investments, officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 亚马逊发射首颗 Kuiper 互联网卫星，向 Starlink 发起挑战
item.description: 亚马逊 Kuiper 宽带互联网星座的首批 27 颗卫星于周一从佛罗里达州发射升空，拉开了拖延已久的太空互联网网络部署的序幕，该网络将与 SpaceX 的 Starlink 相媲美。【原文：The first 27 satellites for Amazon's Kuiper broadband internet constellation were launched into space from Florida on Monday, kicking off the long-delayed deployment of an internet-from-space network that will rival SpaceX's Starlink.】

item.title: 调查显示，新兴经济体在人工智能信任度方面遥遥领先
item.description: 墨尔本大学（University of Melbourne）和专业服务公司毕马威（KPMG）的一项重要调查发现，新兴经济体的人们比发达经济体的人们更愿意相信人工智能，而且对其带来的好处也更加乐观和兴奋。【原文：People in emerging economies are more willing to trust AI than those in advanced economies and are more optimistic and excited about its benefits, a major survey by the University of Melbourne and professional services firm KPMG has found.】

item.title: 特斯拉位于内华达州的 Semi 工厂将于 2025 年底生产出首批卡车
item.description: 特斯拉在关于 Semi 的最新消息中表示，首批电动卡车将于 2025 年底在内华达州的千兆工厂园区下线。【原文：Tesla , in an update on Semi, said that the first units of the electric trucks will be on the production line by the end of 2025 at its Nevada gigafactory campus.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 提议将美国的合法住所从特拉华州迁至得克萨斯州
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 董事会周一在 6 月 17 日股东大会前提交的一份文件中，呼吁其股东批准将其美国业务从特拉华州迁至得克萨斯州。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre's board called on its shareholders on Monday to approve a redomestication of its U.S. operations from Delaware to Texas, in a filing ahead of a June 17 shareholders meeting.】

item.title: 由于第一季度业绩强劲、需求稳定，拉丁美洲航空公司上调了核心盈利展望
item.description: 拉美航空周一上调了今年的核心盈利预期，理由是第一季度业绩强劲且需求稳定。【原文：LATAM Airlines on Monday hiked its estimated core earnings for the year, citing strong first-quarter results and stable demand.】

item.title: 标普将波音评级从 "信用观察 "负面名单中移除，原因是飞机生产改善
item.description: 全球评级机构 S&P 周一表示，由于波音公司的飞机产量不断提高，现金消耗减少，该机构已将波音公司的评级从 "负面信用观察"（CreditWatch）中移除。【原文：S&P has removed Boeing's rating from CreditWatch negative on improving aircraft production and lower cash burn, the global ratings agency said on Monday.】

item.title: 泰瑞达因芯片测试工具需求强劲，预计第二季度营收乐观
item.description: 泰瑞达（Teradyne）周一预计第二季度营收高于华尔街预期，季度利润和营收也超过预期，主要得益于半导体测试设备的稳定需求。【原文：Teradyne on Monday forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations and beat estimates for quarterly profit and revenue, helped by steady demand for its semiconductor-testing equipment.】

item.title: 布朗公司因收费收入增加而利润上升
item.description: 保险经纪公司布朗布朗周一公布，受益于佣金和费用收入的增加，第一季度利润增长了 13%。【原文：Insurance brokerage Brown & Brown reported a 13% rise in first-quarter profit on Monday, benefiting from higher income from commissions and fees.】

item.title: 现货价格上涨，美国钢铁制造商纽柯季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 美国钢铁制造商纽柯公司（Nucor Corp）周一公布的第一季度营收和利润超出分析师预期，主要得益于钢厂业务的强劲增长。【原文：U.S. steelmaker Nucor Corp beat analysts' estimates for first-quarter revenue and profit on Monday, helped by strength in its mills segment operations.】
